about_the_game:
Join Mic, Sarah and Manny in a point and click misadventure to challenge paradoxes, ratcorns and windmills in a medieval fantasy land.
Play the first steps for free and get the vibe of the game.
Don't forget to wishlist if you liked it.

The game

There is an accident waiting to happen in some campus. Manny is the proffessor assigned to out-of-the-box researching at the university. He is about to find out how wrong his calculations were with some transport prototype in terms of time displacement.

Meanwhile Mic is nearby, ready to go back home and plan a tabletop RPG session. Sadly, something is about to delay those plans a few thousand years.

Such anomaly quickly changes the peaceful lands of Lord Nicola. Some things start showing at random places and some others vanish inexplicably. It's up to the town's new hero to find out everything, helping the town and himself.

Highlights (Demo)

  • 45 minutes or more to finish (way more if you enjoy trying all the posible interactions)
  • Linear progression
  • Funny geek interactions
  • Verb token actions
  • Easy, Normal and Hard modes

Specifications (Demo)

  • 2D hand drawn scenes and characters
  • 5 playable scenes
  • 2 playable characters
  • 5 unique NPCs
  • 8 unique items
  • 1 minigame
  • We are hoping to add more languages and platform options in the future

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Window 7 64 bits
  • Processor: 2 GHz (Dual Core)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, 512 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bits
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz (Dual Core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, 1 GB dedicated VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Point and Click adventure in a medieval fantasy ambience Imagine you are a random tabletop geek looking for new adventures and your friend makes a tiiny mistake with his time machine... Now add an adventurer, a noble and a detective and mix them all together in yourself. Must be fun, right?

English, Spanish - Latin America*, Portuguese - Brazil
